content:
What do folks think about our current tooltip font size? It's pretty small, and I feel like it's probably a pixel or so too small.

(https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/13261 is a very old issue proposing making our tooltips a bit bigger, which changing this would close out)
I'm +1 on bumping it up one pixel.

@Aman Agrawal (amanagr) want to try doing that? I feel like most of the work will be doing a bit of testing whether we need to make some tooltips wider to avoid unnecessary wrapping with a larger font size.
Merged; I'll do a chat.zulip.org deploy sometime today, and then we can see if we notice anything that now line-wraps poorly.
